title: Co-operative farming in East Germany
brief_description: Describes co-operative farming in East Germany, illustrates patterns of family and village life and provides economic and social insights into communal living. Includes scenes of potato harvesting, dairy farming and the activities of the Communist Party organisation - the Free German Youth.
